Sound.comm: Great sound quality for highs, mids, and lows.

cont.entity_a: Sound is crisp and clear, enhancing music detail. Sound quality reveals the difference between compressed and uncompressed audio.
cont.entity_b: Detailed bass. Warm, natural sound profile with a wide soundstage.

Comfort.comm: Very comfortable fit, even for extended use.

cont.entity_a: Open ear design leaks sound, not ideal for public or noisy environments.
cont.entity_b: Open back design allows ambient sound in, not suitable for noise isolation.

cont.entity_a: with minor cosmetic cracks after long-term use.
The long cable is sometimes cumbersome.
Requires an adapter plug for certain devices.
cont.entity_b: Requires a proper amp for optimal performance.

cont.entity_a: Good value for price, especially when found on sale.
